page.title: 09"KEEPERS FARM"
page.content: { Keepers Farm}is a livestock farm with {79}acres{(32 hectares)}because the soil is not suitable for growing crops.It is too heavily clayed .It has{fifteen}adult goats,{fourteen females and{one}male goat. Surplus goats are fattened then{slaughtered. They have cows,{Aberdeen Anguses}are fattened for beef, and{Friesians}are bred for milking.{Keepers Farm}has {twenty two}heifers,{fifteen 6}month old calves and{fourteen}young calves and{29}female calves. The owners of{Keepers Farm}sell 340 litres of milk to the public each year and{258000}litres to Milk Marketing Board.The{EEC}cut back more on{Keepers {Farm}than most because they kept the same amount of cows for four years. {Keepers Farm}has{four}workers.{Keepers {Farm}does not use many{chemicals}only {Phosphate}and{Potash}etc.
